sentence.Network_en: He added there was clear culpability on the part of the government.
sentence.Network_cn: 他补充说政府方面明显负有责任。

sentence.Network_en: As if the estrangement between them had come of any culpability of hers.
sentence.Network_cn: 姐弟俩疏远的责任竟仿佛落到了她的身上!

sentence.Network_en: The offence, as now defined in English law, covers a wide spectrum of culpability.
sentence.Network_cn: 英国法律规定, 违法包括很多种过失行为.

entry.tran: 应受责备的;难辞其咎的
entry.def: If someone or their conduct is culpable, they are responsible for something wrong or bad that has happened.

example.ex: Their decision to do nothing makes them culpable.
example.tran: 他们不采取任何行动的决定使他们难辞其咎。
应该受到处罚的因为疏忽导致的过失杀人罪
